title: Super Mario Bros.
brief_description: In 1985, Nintendo introduced the world to one of the most iconic and endearing videogame characters of all time, Mario. Well, Super Mario to you. The red overall-wearing plumber bounced his way into history and pop culture consciousness in the first of many videogames.

constellations_other.name: When music speaks
constellations_other.description: Some characters or moments are expressed more intensely through a musical motif than dialogue or action.

constellations_other.name: Representation of women in videogames
constellations_other.description: Ms Pac-Man is the first famous female game protagonist, but let's face it â€“ she's just Pac-Man with a bow. This Constellation looks at the history of female representation in videogames.

description: In 1985, Nintendo introduced the world to one of the most iconic and endearing videogame characters of all time, Mario. Well, Super Mario to you. The red overall-wearing plumber bounced his way into history and pop culture consciousness in the first of many, many videogames that saw him venturing through Mushroom Kingdom to save Princess Peach from Bowser, king of the Koopas.
description_for_label: In 1985, Nintendo introduced the world to one of the most iconic and endearing videogame characters of all time, Mario. Well, Super Mario to you. The red overall-wearing plumber bounced his way into history and pop culture consciousness in the first of many, many videogames that saw him venturing through Mushroom Kingdom to save Princess Peach from Bowser, king of the Koopas.
